title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsBasic concepts, linearized disturbance equation and normal mode analysis, Stability of motion of super-imposed fluids, stability of parallel flows, Inviscid analysis, Viscous analysis, Analytical and numerical methods, Stability of rotating flow, Stability of flows with thermal gradient.
